TopicTitle: Be nice to Modders - move ModuleEnginesFX, ModuleRCS, etc. into an open-sourced DLL

Articles.Content: It would be particularly nice if most of the Squad PartModules could be moved into a plugin DLL in /GameData/Squad/, with source provided, so that mod coders could more easily understand them and thereby create new classes that inherent from them. (Making more of their member functions public and virtual would also be a nice gesture).
